games.title: Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers
games.description: Immerse yourself in a delightful realm of art and tranquility with Color Pixels - Coloring by Numbers. Easily turn black-and-white images into colorful creations by following the numbered instructions. This free online game offers a fun way to unwind, whether on a phone or computer, allowing everyone to achieve beautiful results.
games.howToPlayText:
Your task is to transform black-and-white images into vibrant works of art by coloring them by numbers. You can play on both computers and touch devices like phones and tablets.

Controls:
1. Select a category from the gallery, then choose a picture to get started.
2. Zoom in or out: Use the slider at the top of the screen, pinch gestures, or your mouse wheel to focus on details.
3. Pick a color: Choose the desired color from the palette at the bottom of the screen.
4. Color by numbers: Find the corresponding areas and bring the picture to life with color.
5. Use boosters: Speed up the coloring process with special tools and achieve the best results.

games.title: Maths Puzzle
games.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you’ll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
games.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You’ll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

games.title: Sticker Art Book Puzzle
games.description:
Dive into the delightful world of Sticker Art Book Puzzle, where imagination meets puzzle-solving in a fun and engaging experience. This innovative app is the ultimate blend of adult coloring, art games, and brain-teasing challenges. This unique app offers a calming and colorful escape, combining the joy of coloring with the thrill of solving puzzles.

Say goodbye to traditional coloring books and hello to the Sticker Book Puzzle. Instead of using pencils, you'll fill intricate designs with vibrant stickers. It's a fresh take on adult coloring; every sticker is a stroke of creativity. Choose from a rich range of colors and match them with stickers to complete stunning artwork. Relax and unwind with Sticker Book Puzzle's calm gameplay.

Sticker Book Puzzle isn't just a coloring book; it's a brain teaser, too! Solve puzzles by strategically placing stickers to match the patterns and unlock the complete picture. Flex your mind and boost your IQ skills!
games.howToPlayText: Playing Sticker Art Book Puzzle is simple yet challenging in all the right ways. Using the provided numbers and shapes, your goal is to arrange the stickers in their corresponding positions to reveal the hidden stiker. With each passing color by number level, the sticker book puzzle become more complex and detailed, leaving you wanting more. Don’t forget to utilize the available hints and power-ups to help you solve the stiker puzzle and tackle more difficult coloring book puzzles.

games.title: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms
games.description: Grid Odyssey: Nonograms – A Captivating Logic Puzzle! Uncover hidden images by filling in the correct squares based on numerical clues. This game sharpens attention, logic, and analytical thinking while providing a satisfying puzzle-solving experience. Ready to reveal the secrets of each pixel? Try it now!
games.howToPlayText: Click or tap on the grid to place a mark. You can switch between crosses or squares on the bottom

games.title: Jenny's Math Puzzle
games.description: "Jenny's Math Puzzle" is an engaging educational puzzle game that combines math challenges with interactive gameplay. Players must strategically place number tiles onto a grid to form correct mathematical equations. As a unique twist, the game seamlessly blends arithmetic practice with logical problem-solving, offering a fresh take on the genre. Its gradually increasing difficulty and visually appealing design make it both fun and mentally stimulating for players of all ages.
games.howToPlayText: The main objective is to complete all mathematical equations on the board by dragging number tiles from the pool to the empty slots. Each equation must be valid (e.g., horizontally or vertically correct). To win, fill the entire grid correctly without any mismatches. The primary control is using the mouse (or touch on mobile devices) to drag and drop tiles. If you make a mistake, you can remove tiles by dragging them back to the pool.

games.title: Merge number up
games.description:
Number Click Merge is a simple yet highly addictive number puzzle game that challenges your logic and observation skills.

Tap on groups of the same number to merge them into a higher number! The more blocks you merge in one move, the more points you earn. As numbers grow, the board becomes more strategic — plan carefully to keep the combos going!
games.howToPlayText:
Tap on two or more connected tiles with the same number.

They merge into one tile with a higher number.

New tiles fall from the top to fill the gaps.

Keep merging to reach higher numbers and beat your high score!
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/merge-number-up?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: 2048 3D: Merge Cubes
games.description:
Merge the Blocks, Reach 2048, and Conquer the Levels!**

Blocks with numbers from 2 to 2048 drop onto the field. Combine matching blocks to create higher-value ones and score points. But watch out — some blocks are stones, which can’t be merged. Use powerful boosters like bombs and lightning to clear them out.
1. Make the most of your boosters:
2. X2 — doubles the value of any number block
3. Bomb — destroys surrounding blocks

Flash — removes all stones from the field

Don’t let the blocks stack above the top boundary for more than three seconds — or it’s game over!

Complete challenging levels, set high scores in endless mode, and become the ultimate merge master!
games.howToPlayText: Swipe left or right on an empty area of the screen (or drag with the left mouse button held down) to move the block into position. Release your finger (or let go of the mouse button) to drop the block.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/2048-3d-merge-cubes?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Sudoku - Number Games
games.description:
Увлекательная логическая игра-головоломка с числами! Тренируйте внимание, развивайте память и логику, да и просто получайте удовольствие!

По мере повышения уровня игра усложняется, но всегда можно вернутся к прошлым уровням и играть на более легком уровне сложности.
games.howToPlayText:
Rules of Sudoku - Number Games is simple:
Inside the playing field there are 9 squares consisting of 3 x 3 cells. Each horizontal row, vertical column and square (9 cells each) must be filled with numbers from 1 to 9, without repeating any numbers in the row, column or square.

games.title: Master of Numbers
games.description: Experience the excitement of mathematics with Master of Numbers, a fast-paced online game. Race to collect beneficial numbers while dodging harmful ones, enhancing your math and strategy skills as you progress through increasingly challenging levels. Play on your phone or computer for an engaging mental workout.
games.howToPlayText:
The goal: to reach the finish line by typing the maximum possible number.
Absorb numbers smaller than yours highlighted in blue. If you encounter a red number larger than yours, you will lose your number and you will have to start over.
Avoid electric saws, cross bridges and jump over ditches.
At the finish line you will find a lot of walls to destroy
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/master-of-numbers-4abc-1?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Sudoku
games.description:
The playing field is a grid with 9x9 cells, divided into smaller grids with a side of 3 cells. Thus, the entire playing field consists of 81 cells. At the beginning of the game, there are already some numbers in them (from 1 to 9). The player is required to fill in the free cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column and in each small 3 ×3 square, each digit would occur only once.
There are multiple levels of difficulty you can choose. Beware of mistakes you can make.
games.howToPlayText: Click on the cell you want to fill and then click on a number you want there. You can click on the "Notes" button to mark possible numbers without placing them.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/sudoku?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Merge 13
games.description: Merge 13 is a thrilling online puzzle game where players combine numbered cells for higher scores. Accessible on various devices without downloads, it provides a captivating mix of logic and math, perfect for puzzle enthusiasts. Jump right in and challenge your strategic thinking to reach 13!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag cells with the same value together to merge them into a higher-numbered cell. Keep combining until you achieve a greater value. The higher the number you reach, the more challenging the puzzle becomes. Watch out for how you position your cells and plan ahead for bigger merges.
Focus on merging cells strategically instead of randomly dragging them together. Sometimes it's better to save certain cells for future merges. Anticipation and planning will help you reach the highest values.

games.title: Merge 2048
games.description:
Merge 2048 is a fun and addictive merging game where your goal is to combine matching numbered blocks to reach higher values—can you unlock the elusive 2048 block?

Choose between two exciting modes:
 Classic 2048 and Shape Mode for a refreshing twist in gameplay.

As you drop blocks, plan your merges carefully to avoid filling up the container.
Feeling stuck? Use the powerful TNT Block to clear unwanted tiles and create space.

The game features clean visuals, smooth controls, and a satisfying progression that keeps you hooked.
Track your score, unlock cool titles, and see how far you can go without hitting the red line.
Perfect for quick sessions or long strategic runs—Merge 2048 is simple to pick up, but hard to master!
games.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Drag by clicking the left mouse button , and leave the button to drop the block.

Mobile:
Drag with touch screen and block is dropped when the drag ends.

games.title: Ball Attack
games.description: Blast through endless waves of bouncing balls, dodge incoming obstacles, and upgrade your powerful cannon to survive longer in this intense, fast-paced arcade shooter filled with nonstop action and explosive fun!
games.howToPlayText:
Drag to Move: Slide your finger (or mouse) left and right to control the cannon.
Shoot Automatically: Your cannon fires continuously—focus on aiming and dodging!
Destroy Balls: Each ball has a number—shoot to reduce it to zero and blast it apart.
Dodge Everything: Avoid touching balls or it’s game over!
Collect Coins: Use coins to upgrade your firepower, speed, and special abilities.
Survive Waves: The longer you last, the tougher (and more rewarding) it gets!

games.title: Nullify - Merge Math
games.description:
Nullify is a minimal abstract relaxing puzzle with the goal of clearing everything from the screen by merging numbers and math symbols.
Improve your logic and math skills by completing unique handcrafted levels and infinite generated levels.

Features:
-56 Levels to complete
-4 Infinite games modes
-Simple and easy controls by dragging elements
-13 math symbols
games.howToPlayText:
Nullify is a minimal abstract relaxing puzzle with the goal of clearing everything from the screen by merging numbers and math symbols.
Improve your logic and math skills by completing unique handcrafted levels and infinite generated levels.
Click and drag to move the symbols and merge them to clear everything from the screen.
games.embed: <iframe src='https://playgama.com/export/game/nullify--merge-math?clid=p_88b901a1-5dc7-4a8c-a5b2-d1c851cf9aaa' allow='fullscreen; accelerometer; camera; clipboard-read; clipboard-write; screen-wake-lock; speaker-selection; web-share; geolocation; gyroscope; microphone; xr-spatial-tracking; autoplay; encrypted-media; picture-in-picture; payment; publickey-credentials-get; publickey-credentials-create; storage-access; attribution-reporting; browsing-topics' frameborder='0' width='800' height='450'></iframe>

games.title: Number Sums
games.description:
Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental math. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row, column, and colored region be equal to the clues on the side of the board and inside the colored regions. Practice your math skills and logic with Number Sums!

Each row, column, and region has its own solution, but the goal of this math game with numbers is to make them all work at the same time. You have to circle the correct numbers and erase the numbers you don't need. Remember, the sums of the numbers in rows, columns and colored regions should be equal to the numbers on the sides of the board and inside each region. Each level of this numbers game has only one solution, try to find it to solve educational math puzzles!

Mental arithmetic is an invaluable math skill for your everyday life. Inside Number Sums you'll find math puzzles of various difficulty. The mechanics of these math riddles sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Playing sum number games and solving math problems can improve your arithmetic skills. If you are interested in number puzzles or math games for adults, and in training your addition skills, play this engaging number game for hours of fun!
games.howToPlayText:
- Circle the correct numbers that add up to the values on the sides of the rows, columns and regions.
- Use the toggle to switch between circling and erasing modes. It will help you to mark the correct numbers and the extra numbers that you don't need.
- Each level of these math puzzles has only one possible solution, so make sure that the rows, columns and colored regions work together at the same time.
- Train your math skills with this free number puzzle with various levels of difficulty. Open different types of board from 3x3 to 10x10.
